sources.title: The Vulture
sources.description: Title: The Vulture Summary: A mad scientist turns himself into a half-man, half-bird monster to avenge the death of his ancestor. Directed by: Lawrence Huntington Actors: Robert Hutton, Akim Tamiroff, Broderick Crawford Production Company: Homeric Films Ltd. Release Date: 3 May 1967 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.85 : 1 A mad scientist turns himself into a half-man, half-bird monster to avenge the death of his ancestor.

metadata.Plot: A mad scientist turns himself into a half-man, half-bird monster to avenge the death of his ancestor.
metadata.Actors: Robert Hutton, Akim Tamiroff, Broderick Crawford
